attributes.action: Make Britain Great Again, be proud and Fly our Union Jack Flag'
attributes.additional_details:
We once were a proud courageous nation.
Our fathers and forefathers fought for our freedoms. Today, people forget the bravery of those who fought and died  for us  by denying our very existence  complaining when our national flag is flown. 
Most countries are proud of their own nation.
We are Great Britain so fly our national flag with  pride.
In America, a person has to swear an allegiance to the country, the same should be done in UK.
attributes.background: Make Britain Great again pass a new law to fly our national Union Jack Flag in all public places, cities, counties, schools, churches, town halls, etc.
